results.title: Breaking silence
results.brief_description: An epidemic number of children endure their early years in confusion and shame as victims of incest and other forms of sexual exploitation. This documentary goes behind the veneer of domestic bliss to study the incidence and effect of incest on families.

results.title: Breaking point
results.creator_credit: Granada Television International and Jack Smith
results.brief_description: This film on safety shows how spinal injuries may be caused by incorrect posture during the lifting or pushing of heavy objects. Injuries due to car accidents are discussed and the use of seatbelts ito minimise accidents is demonstrated.

results.title: Breaking barriers
results.creator_credit: John Sexton Productions, New South Wales. Anti-Discrimination Board and New South Wales Film Corporation
results.brief_description: A look at your rights under the New South Wales Anti-Discrimination Act, 1977 where “equal opportunity” should be given to all and no discrimination should exist on the grounds of race, sex or marital status.

results.creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Ralph Strasser

results.title: Break down the barriers
results.creator_credit: Town and Country Productions, Queensland National Fitness Council and Bill Latto
results.brief_description: Illustrates how disabled people are breaking down the barriers which, until recently, often precluded their participation in any other than stereotyped recreational activities. Demonstrates such recreational activities as grass skiing, canoeing, lawn and ten pin bowling, swish, rifle shooting, scuba diving, hang gliding, disco and square dancing etc. Commentary by Stan Pretty.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Town and Country Productions, Queensland National Fitness Council and Bill Latto

results.title: Break & enter
results.creator_credit: Melanie Coombs, Cinemedia Corporation, XYZ Entertainment and Amanda Brotchie
results.brief_description: A routine home invasion leads to a comedic exploration of gender and identity when a middle aged housewife swaps roles with the intruder who intended to rob her but was foiled by a frying pan. Cast includes Mark Peglar, Marion Heathfield and Robin Cummings with a music score by Mick Harvey.

results.title: Bread of eternal life
results.creator_credit: Vincenzo Labella, Franco Zeffirelli and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 11 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the temple of Sanhedrin; Joseph of Arimathea, Nicodemus and Caiaphas; Judas visits with Zerah in his quarters in the temple; the last supper; Jesus breaks bread with his disciples and gives them the commandment of love; Jesus predicts he will be betrayed by Judas.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vincenzo Labella, Franco Zeffirelli and Don Bosco Multimedia

results.title: Bread is life
results.brief_description: The story of the Bread Research Institute of the CSIRO and what it does including: analysing flour samples and experimenting with proportion of gluten in the flour mix; experimenting with machines for making bread; methods of storing flour; analysing faulty loaves and offering advice to improve quality.
